attributes.action: Amend Taxation Policies to Make All Churches and Places of Worship Pay Tax
attributes.additional_details:
From the Church of England alone, £60,000,000 could be returned to HMRC each year to help with funding the nation. An organisation that has income of £1000,000,000 can afford to finance itself.

There is no reason Churches and other places of worship should be tax exempt or reduced, non-belivers or athiest should not suffer the bill for any belief organisation, an organisation that has income of £1000,000,000 can afford to finance itself.
attributes.background: Make all churches and places of worship liable for paying tax which is a fair and reasonable proposal.
